name: DEFENDERS OF THE FALLEN ISLAND
description: Do you have what it takes to defend what is yours? This is not a typical tower defense game where the troops do all the work. This is a hybrid FPS/TPS tower defense game which you take over the control to defend your island.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit or newer Processor: 2.69 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX560, AMD HD 6850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
